name: Kelly Miller
text: A great selection of pizzas, made quick and small so you can try a variety amongst your family. Good drink menu too that includes beer and some unique flavored fruit drinks. Plenty of space to dine in for a quick bite of pizza. It reminds me of a Quodba but w/pizza and cheaper. I like the environmental friendly products too.

name: Bob Oliver
text: The order through their call center was messed up. The store fixed it but of the 9 pizzas I ordered 6 had to be remade. They were done almost a half hour later but then the 3 good ones were cold. Not the best experience.

name: Sandra Lynn Hocking
text: Pizza is very good.  May I suggest you unlock the right door to get into the building.  I sat here in the parking lot and watched a total of 9 people attempt to open the door on the right to find out it did not open and that they had to use the one on the left to get into the building. Not cool.

name: Hunter Oliver
text: I've eaten there several times for lunch with no complaints. Today I ordered with the mobile app (first time) and they got my order wrong. Management apologized and gave us coupons for free pizzas. Definitely made up for the mishap. I will eat there again. Oh and the food is pretty good too.
